Preview links in a popup without opening new tabs. Quickly search using text selection or keyboard shortcuts while staying on the same page.

âœ¨  Preview Links Instantly
Hover over or click on links to preview content in a popup, without navigating away from your current tab. Save time and stay focused.

ğŸ”  Search Smarter
Search the web directly from any page without opening a new tab. Use the selection popup or open a quick search bar using keyboard shortcut to search anything instantly.

ğŸ¤–  Turn Your AI Into an Assistant
Use your favorite AI tools like ChatGPT or Gemini automated by Blync. Set action items with prompt, on any text selection the item shows in popup and clicking on it opens AI prompt in popup or sidebar.

âœ…  Itâ€™s serverless and runs entirely within your browser.

ğŸ‘‰ Does Blync Link Preview work on all websites?

ğŸ‘‰ Do I need an AI account to use the AI Assistant?

âœ… Blync automates the process, making it faster and easier for you to access AI features.

ğŸ‘‰ What AI agents does Blync support?

ğŸ’¡ Why Choose Blync?

âœ… Stay Focused: No more tab overload or switching between windows.

âœ… Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly with the tools you already love.
âœ… Whether you're working, learning or just exploring the web Blync keeps everything within reach and helps you stay in the flow.

ğŸ” Maghanap ng Mas Mabilis  
Maghanap sa web direkta mula sa anumang pahina nang hindi nagbubukas ng bagong tab. Gamitin ang selection popup o buksan ang mabilis na search bar gamit ang keyboard shortcut upang maghanap agad ng anumang bagay.
